head.title: Florida Sunshine In Pillows and Duvets

hedline.hl1: Florida Sunshine In Pillows and Duvets

abstract.p: Jennifer Subrin's MeMe line of bright pillows and duvet covers noted; photo (Currents column) (S)

block.p: ''A huge part of our relationship is projects,'' said Jennifer Subrin, who started a business with her husband, Dennis Witnauer, making couch pillows, duvet covers and pillowcases using vintage fabrics. ''I'm an actress, and Dennis is a painter,'' she added. ''I go on the fly, and he has pretty specific ideas of how things fit together.''

Their line of bright floral pillows, above, is called MeMe, after Ms. Subrin's grandmother, who retired in Florida. ''The designs are on fabrics that remind me of her, her housecoats, her upholstery, the sunroom,'' Ms. Subrin said.

''A huge part of our relationship is projects,'' said Jennifer Subrin, who started a business with her husband, Dennis Witnauer, making couch pillows, duvet covers and pillowcases using vintage fabrics. ''I'm an actress, and Dennis is a painter,'' she added. ''I go on the fly, and he has pretty specific ideas of how things fit together.''

Their line of bright floral pillows, above, is called MeMe, after Ms. Subrin's grandmother, who retired in Florida. ''The designs are on fabrics that remind me of her, her housecoats, her upholstery, the sunroom,'' Ms. Subrin said.
Pillows, 18 inches square, with removable covers and hidden closures, are $55; queen duvet covers, $270; pillowcases, $50 a pair; (718) 963-3772 or www.tracingspace.com.
